item.description:
We'll all meet at 10:00 am at Strawberry Banke

 

Then we'll check out the Open Market at Strawberry Banke

http://www.strawberybanke.org/

and maybe the museum if anyone is interested before lunch

 

Portsmouth Open Market operates every Sunday through October 30, 2011 (except Aug 21, Sep 4 and Sep 18), from 10am to 4pm on Puddle Dock on the our campus. Independent artists, artisans, craftspeople and farmers showcase their wares and sell directly to the public. Enjoy fresh air, sunshine, one of a kind products and a chance to chat with the maker, grower or producer of the products you buy. A perfect opportunity to celebrate craftsmanship and enhance the local economy by supporting small local businesses.

Make a day of it with a tour of Strawbery Banke Museum followed by a walk to the local shops and eateries. Admission to Portsmouth Open Market is free. Proof of a purchase from any Portsmouth Open Market vendor entitles the visitor to a 2-for-1 discount on admission to Strawbery Banke and 10% off purchases in the Museum Store.

 

We have an 11:30 reservation at Jumpin Jays Fish Cafe

http://www.jumpinjays.com/

After lunch break we can up into groups.  The weather seems like it will be perfect!

1) Isle of Shoals Boat (315 Market St)  Admission $28.00 ($25.00 seniors)

Boat boards at 1:25 and returns at 4:55

http://www.islesofshoals.com/cart/index.php?event_id=3062

If you want to be on the boat you should probably buy your tickets before Sunday.  I checked and there are 167 tickets available for Sunday.

 

2) Prescott Park Theater http://www.prescottpark.org/calendars.cfm

It's also a nice park

There's a 2:00 pm showing of "Midsummer Night's Dream" (2-4 pm) in the Park

 

3) Walk around downtown and check the place out more or take a walking tour

http://www.portsmouthchamber.org/pht.cfm

 

There's also a 7:00 pm showing of "The Wizard of Oz" at Prescott Park for those that want to stay in Portsmouth for the evening.

See you Sunday!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign "Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel" call me at 617 899-0740 if you can't find us

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Day trip to Portsmouth, NH
